00101     PropertyObj _bodySetProp;

00109     PropertyObj _markerSetProp;

00111 
00113     // 2008_06_06: No longer a property because the joints are kept
00114     // local to the bodies in the Simbody Dynamics Engine.
00115     // For the SIMM and SDFast engines to continue to work, the properties
00116     // must be moved local to those classes.
00117     // The strategy now is to get OpenSim working with the Simbody engine
00118     // as quickly as possible.
00119     JointSet _jointSet;
00120 
00122     // 2008_06_06: No longer a property because the coordinates are kept
00123     // local to the joints in the Simbody Dynamics Engine.
00124     // For the SIMM and SDFast engines to continue to work, the properties
00125     // must be moved local to those classes.
00126     // The strategy now is to get OpenSim working with the Simbody engine
00127     // as quickly as possible.
00128     CoordinateSet _coordinateSet;
00129 
00131     // 2008_06_06: No longer a property because the speeds are generated
00132     // from the coordinates, which are kept local to the joints.
00133     // For the SIMM and SDFast engines to continue to work, the properties
00134     // must be moved local to those classes.
00135     // The strategy now is to get OpenSim working with the Simbody engine
00136     // as quickly as possible.
00137     SpeedSet _speedSet;
